install.name: SimplePayPal
install.author: Fabrizio Albonico
install.description:
Module for displaying a simple PayPal Donate button
(c) 2009 Fabrizio Albonico

param.name: business
param.label: E-Mail/PayPal ID
param.description: Your registered PayPal e-mail address or PayPal ID

param.name: item_name
param.label: Reason
param.description: The reason of your donations. Will be printed on the PayPal confirmation

param.name: currencies
param.label: Currencies
param.description: Displays a combo so that users can select the preferred currency. Separate with comma , symbol, first currency will be the default one. Valid currencies: EUR,USD,GBP,CHF,AUD,HKD,CAD,JPY, NZD,SGD,SEK,DKK,PLN,NOK,HUF,CZK, ILS,MXN

param.name: amount
param.label: Amount
param.description: Sets the amount for the donation. Leave empty if user has to write the amount himself

param.name: return
param.label: Success return page
param.description: Full path to the return page after a correct payment

param.name: cancel_return
param.label: Cancel return page
param.description: Full path to the return page after a failed payment

param.name: image_url
param.label: Company Logo URL
param.description: Full path to the company logo image

param.name: pp_image
param.label: Paypal button image
param.description: Sets the PayPal button image. Full list can be found here: http://www.rocketgranny.com/codeclips/pp_button_images.php

param.name: locale
param.label: Locale
param.description: Sets the locale for redirecting to the correct language paypal

param.name: open_new_window
param.label: Open new window
param.description: Opens the PayPal site as a new window
